name: install-terraform
description: Install Terraform at any version to a Github Action Job environment

repository.version:1-changelog: auto-changelog -p --template keepachangelog auto-changelog --breaking-pattern 'BREAKING CHANGE:' && git add CHANGELOG.md
repository.version:2-cleandeps: mv node_modules tmp_modules && npm i --only=prod && git add node_modules --force

author: Bret Comnes <bcomnes@gmail.com> (https://bret.io/)
